mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (id, openid, nickname, weixinid, sex, signature, birthday, phone, name, headimgurl, intro, credit, registtime, country, province, city, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{registtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixinid = #{weixinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit = #{credit,jdbcType=REAL}, registtime = #{registtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, openid, nickname, weixinid, sex, signature, birthday, phone, name, headimgurl, intro, credit, registtime, country, province, city, state from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, openid, nickname, weixinid, sex, signature, birthday, phone, name, headimgurl, intro, credit, registtime, country, province, city, state from user
